pkgmetadata.longdescription: zombase=======zombase is a collection of tools and best practices designed to helpdeveloppers write beautiful APIs for their data layer.Dependencies------------zombase is built upon the following projects:* `SQLAlchemy <http://http://www.sqlalchemy.org/>`_* `dogpile.cache <http://dogpilecache.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_* `Voluptuous <https://github.com/alecthomas/voluptuous>`_
